author: Jason Bruckal
comment: Why can't I see any information offline? This app freaks out and blocks seeing itineraries without internet access... Which happens sometimes (like on a plane), and you just want to see your connection information

reply.author: American Airlines, Inc.
reply.content: We appreciate your feedback Jason. Yes, you can see the boarding passes offline and we are looking to add to this functionality as well in related areas. What are you wanting to see for the Admiral's Club?

author: Drew Busmire
comment: The UX on this app is terrible. How do you have an app that doesn't have the words "Check In" somewhere in it. Also why the hell is it almost 100mb. What are you doing that requires that size?  Sincerely,  Sorrynotsorry

author: Michael Dunn
comment: I don't know what some of the other people are complaining about. I just loaded this to my Moto G4 and it works just fine. Maybe it's not the app but the phone.

The AA app has always had minor bugs but the recent update removed the ability to change seats. My company always books the cheapest seat so I regularly use the app to change. A big disappointment... Why remove features? Hopefully the "upgrade" feature works now. In years past I would request an upgrade through the app but when I got to my gate i was never on the list. Irritating, I am almost ready to give up on AA for business travel.

author: A Google User
comment: The latest UI is a good improvement... it probably looks better than most airline apps but the function is still severely lacking.  Upgrade list (is hidden except within a widow of time), standby list Indy there  (big miss), seat map and more is missing or really hard to get to.

reply.author: American Airlines, Inc.
reply.content: We appreciate your feedback. We do support that functionality so if you care to email us at aa.mobile@aa.com someone will get back with you about how best to view this and we can take steps based on your feedback to make it easier to see.

author: Greg Noeninckx
comment: App doesn't appear to have app notifications in it, but the iPhone version does. Have to sign up for text or email alerts on Android. Strange. Rest of app is generally slow. No problems with boarding pass, though.

author: Naomi Tennakoon
comment: My flight got delayed and moved and I couldn't see the update on the app because it couldn't connect to the server. Therefore I had to call someone and write it down myself so that I would know

author: David Offutt
comment: The application repeatedly closes immediately after opening. In other words, it is non-functional

author: Michelle Davis
comment: This app is supposed to be useful for I flight entertainment, but I can't find  it. I tried every link. Does it even exist? My email says so.

author: Kelly Wagstaff
comment: Worst app EVER!!! Don't even THINK about trying to manage your flight, or seat assignments. Ridiculous. My advice...FLY DELTA!!!!!

author: george richards
comment: App was great when it worked, hasn't worked in more than two weeks. Won't load most time, when it does load it won't let me sign-in most times, the two times I did sign in it wouldn't let me check in. Was a 5 star app. No it looks completely useless.

author: Ged Clink
comment: Since updating the App shows my US flights based on current date location which is New Zealand. So although the times and flight numbers are correct i am apparently flying on different dates. Called call centre and they not aware of the issue and confirmed my flights were on correct dates. The app thinks im flying 24 hours later i.e day following. Can you fix please?

author: axel dion
comment: After recent update the app no longer worked. For those with same issue, I uninstalled and reinstalled then it started working again.

author: Tony Ballis
comment: Samsung Galaxy 8 - Since the last update, I can't even open the app. Every time I try it crashes and automatically closes.
Updated version does not open. Galaxy S6. Wish I had not updated as I am flying tomorrow and now can't take advantage of the app. Useless.

author: Alexander Nagrebetsky
comment: Slow to load, unintuitive interface. A number of features are missing/difficult to find: - bag check in is one such feature available on United app, but not on AA

author: Jared Weitzel
comment: App will not open after latest update. It crashes as soon as you try to open.

reply.author: American Airlines, Inc.
reply.content: We appreciate your feedback Jared. You should be able to see your other segments by hitting the arrow (should be lit when there is another segment to your trip) or swiping. As for the notification removal, we hear you. Please stay tuned.

comment: Not dependable. Does not always load. May have to try two or three times.  When it does load, it often crashes.

author: Daniel Echarren
comment: I no longer can get my boarding pass on my watch (Moto360) what gives? Please Fix!

author: Lance Warden
comment: Slow, buggy, doesn't do in flight streaming like airline says.

author: Rolf Guntert
comment: UPDATE: App updated yesterday, still useless. Crashes every time I try to start the app (Samsung Glaxaxy S8+)

author: MrNemo1one
comment: Was suppose to down load for free 9n flight movies didn't work got the run around american airline is not good

author: Jeffrey Struyk
comment: The app keeps closing before it fully launches, rendering it completely useless.

author: Andres Galante
comment: This app doesn't work on airplane mode or offline, that when you most need it since you'd use it while traveling

author: Leonardo Andrade
comment: Not working after last update. Keeps crashing

author: Debra Kenna
comment: This App hasn't worked for me for months. Keeps crashing when i try to open it.  Reported the issue with still no fix.

author: Connie A
comment: Unable to search flights since the new update
Slow to update when flights are disrupted, and no way to tell it to update.  This is the worst of the major airline apps.

author: Yahay Obeid
comment: Garbage. Got to the payment section and app crapped out. Ended up booking United.

author: Jon Marks
comment: Doesn't work

author: Rachel Landsberger
comment: After update I can no longer access the search button to book a flight. Please fix!

author: Pete Pickett II
comment: When you load the itenerary it should cache so you can use it in Airplane mode! After all this is American airlines!

author: Robert Penny
comment: Please provide a setting to use 24-hr time format for flight info.

author: Paul Carmichael
comment: Shockingly bad and completely unstable

author: Heather Davis
comment: App won't open/keeps closing after the most recent update.

author: Dennis Wheeler
comment: It says you can watch entertainment but I can't find it!

author: Alan Hall
comment: Quick and easy to use. Great updates while traveling especially gate changes and baggage tracking.

author: Ed ward
comment: Still won't open

author: Xada Di
comment: Functional!

author: Curtdogg11v
comment: App crashes instantly
